ChallengeTalk_003:
♪Leave the...rms... Leave the...rms...♪<sp:1:3:4:32000000>


♪If not...do you harm...♪<sp:1:3:4:32000000>
ChallengeTalk_004:
♪Leave the arms, leave the arms...
For if not, I'll do you harm.♪<sp:1:3:4:32000000>
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Humming_00>♪Seek the storm, seek the storm...♪


♪Fear it not, you will stay warm.♪
ChallengeTalk_005:
<snd:Humming_00>♪Seek the storm, seek the storm...♪


♪Fear it not, you will stay warm.♪
ChallengeTalk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to keep practicing my singing in
this well! The acoustics are really nice.

Maybe I could live here? Then I'd never
have to walk to practice my singing!

Oh, but all these weapons are in the way.
I don't need them, so take as many as
you want!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Oh, it's you! Did you come back to see
me? <sp:5:0:0>Or are you a well enthusiast?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm sorry, but I'm right in the middle of
practicing my song.
ChallengeTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>...Huh?<sp:5:0:0> When did you get here?<sp:5:0:0> Do you
need something from me?
ChallengeTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>"Leave the arms"? <sp:5:0:0>What are you
talking about?

I wasn't singing anything remotely like
that! I've never sung a song with
those lyrics...
<sp:3:0:2:0101>♪Seek the storm, seek the storm...♪<sp:5:0:0>
Is that maybe what you heard?

Because that's what I was singing!


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You also heard "for if not, I'll do
you harm"?

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Leave your arms or I'll kill you? <sp:5:0:0>Hahaha!<sp:5:0:0>
What kind of nonsensical song is that?

♪Fear it not, you will stay warm.♪


Those are the lyrics I was singing! And if
you put it all together...

<snd:Humming_00>♪Seek the storm, seek the storm...
Fear it not, you will stay warm.♪

<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Think_00>It's a song about a cute little fox who is
proud of their warm fur coat, and they
chase storms since they don't get cold!
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Anyway, I'm not trying to cause trouble
or anything... <sp:5:1:0>But I don't think it's entirely
my fault if people misheard things either.
I just like how my voice sounds here.<sp:5:0:0>
Prettier. More refined.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_00>Hmph. It sounded fine to me, but
everyone else is hearing dire threats.

"Leave the arms..." I guess that explains
why weapons kept getting thrown in the
well every morning.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to keep on practicing! It's the
only way to keep getting better!

Help yourself to these weapons—they just
get in my way. <sp:5:1:0>Really, you're doing me a
favor by taking them!
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Think>I'm sorry, but could you leave me be?
I'm trying to focus right now...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>OK, focus. <sp:5:0:0>Fooocusss...
ChallengeTalk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>They could be dangerous, so I collected
them all over there.

I've got no interest in them, so feel free
to help yourself!
